input.sentences: we painted the church today to celebrate same sex marriage .
this is the patron saint of homosexuality .
finally we have opened our hearts to openess .
and free ourselves of the shackles of the past .
here is an inscription . a holy promise to love and treat all equally .
output.sentences: The two men painted the wall in their favorite colors for their marriage to each other.
The patron saint of homosexuality was positioned near by for good fortune.
They were thrilled to express their vows openly, finally revealing to all what they felt in their hearts.
They cast aside the shackles of secrecy and reveled in their freedom to express.
Their vows of promise, acceptance, love and fair treatment brought tears to their eyes.
